metadata.title: Origins Energizing Essentials Set - Big size GinZing Moisturizer 2.5 oz+Scrub Cleanse+Renewal Serum+Retexturizing Mask and Cotton Wristlet

categorization.explanation: The product is a skincare set which includes a moisturizer, scrub, serum, and mask, all of which are typically used on the face. Therefore, it fits best under the 'Face' subcategory of 'Skin Care' in 'Beauty & Personal Care'.
